title: Steph Curry, Peyton Manning, Magic Johnson, and where Colin was right and wrong
itunes:title: Steph Curry, Peyton Manning, Magic Johnson, and where Colin was right and wrong
description:
Colin talks about how Golden State Warriors G Steph Curry is better than most people think, why Peyton Manning would be a bad GM for the New York Jets, Magic Johnson's comments on him leaving the Los Angeles Lakers, and where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Guests include Chris Broussard, Kendrick Perkins, and Geoff Schwartz.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
